alert.note: Alert for Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:49PM EDT until August 04 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rutland County in southern Vermont... Northwestern Windsor County in southern Vermont... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rutland City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Rutland, Woodstock, Killington, Shrewsbury, Rutland City, Stockbridge, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Plymouth, Bridgewater, Mendon, Clarendon, West Rutland, Proctor, Ira, Pittsfield, Reading, Barnard, Bethel, Chittenden, and Pittsford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
